title: Definitions
context: [PART III.] DRINKING WATER FINANCING ยง340E-31 Definitions. As used in this part, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009&rdquo; means the federal law, Public Law 111-5, making appropriations for various purposes, including job preservation and creation, infrastructure investment, energy efficiency and science, assistance to the unemployed, and state and local fiscal stabilization purposes. &ldquo;Drinking water fund&rdquo; means the drinking water treatment revolving loan fund established by section 340E-35. [L 1997, c 218, pt of ยง2; am L 2009, c 98, ยง4]
